Description: Rim sherd of East Greek pottery plate; white slip. On top of rim, thick zig-zag; at edge of bowl broad band with probably two added red bands; to the centre narrow band and remains of decoration: three diagonals with added red; outside of rim glazed, line on underside; band and line on exterior wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.1057)
